Verses: 1 raajaavaagiya Lemuvelukkaduththa Vasanangal; Avan Thaai Avanukkup Podhiththa Ubadhesamaavadhu:
2 en Magane, En Karppaththin Kumaarane, En Poruththanaigalin Puththirane,
3 sthreegalukku Un Belanaiyum, Raajaakkalaik Kedukkum Kaariyangalukku Un Vazhigalaiyum Kodaadhe.
4 thraatcharasam Kudippadhu Raajaakkalukkuth Thagudhiyalla; Lemuvele, Adhu Raajaakkalukkuth Thagudhiyalla; Madhubaanam Prabukkalukkuth Thagudhiyalla.
5 madhubaanampanninaal Avargal Nyaayappiramaanaththai Marandhu, Sirumaippadugiravargaludaiya Nyaayaththaiyum Purattuvaargal.
6 madindhupogiravanukku Madhubaanaththaiyum, Manankasandhavargalukkuth Thraatcharasaththaiyum Kodungal;
7 avan Kudiththuth Than Kuraivai Marandhu, Than Varuththaththai Appuram Ninaiyaadhirukkattum.
8 oomaiyanukkaagavum Thikkatravargalellaarudaiya Nyaayaththukkaagavum Un Vaayaith Thira.
9 un Vaayaith Thirandhu, Needhiyaai Nyaayantheerththu, Sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavanukku Nyaayansey.
10 gunasaaliyaana Sthreeyaik Kandupidippavan Yaar? Avaludaiya Vilai Muththukkalaippaarkkilum Uyarndhadhu.
11 aval Purushanudaiya Irudhayam Avalai Nambum; Avan Sambaththuk Kuraiyaadhu.
12 aval Uyirodirukkira Naalellaam Avanukkuth Theemaiyaiyalla, Nanmaiyaiye Seygiraal.
13 aattumayiraiyum Sanalaiyum Thedi, Than Kaigalinaal Urchaagaththode Velaiseygiraal.
14 aval Vyaabaarak Kappalgalaip Polirukkiraal; Dhooraththilirundhu Than Aagaaraththaik Konduvarugiraal.
15 iruttode Ezhundhu Than Veettaarukku Aagaarankoduththu, Than Velaikkaarigalukkup Padiyalakkiraal.
16 oru Vayalai Visaariththu Adhai Vaangugiraal; Than Kaigalin Sambaaththiyaththinaal Thraatchaththottaththai Naattugiraal.
17 thannaip Belaththaal Idaikkattikkondu, Than Kaigalaip Balappaduththugiraal.
18 than Vyaabaaram Prayojanamulladhendru Arindhirukkiraal; Iravile Aval Vilakku Anaiyaadhirukkum.
19 than Kaigalai Raattinaththil Vaikkiraal; Aval Viralgal Kadhiraip Pidikkum.
20 sirumaiyaanavargalukkuth Than Kaiyaith Thirandhu, Ezhaigalukkuth Than Karangalai Neettugiraal.
21 than Veettaar Anaivarukkum Rattaippurai Uduppirukkiradhaal, Than Veettaarinimiththam Kulirukku Bayappadaal.
22 raththinak Kambalangalaith Thanakku Undupannugiraal; Melliyapudavaiyum Raththaambaramum Aval Uduppu.
23 aval Purushan Dhesaththu Mooppargalode Nyaayasthalangalil Utkaarndhirukkaiyil Perpetravanaayirukkiraan.
24 melliya Pudavaigalai Undupanni Virkiraal; Kachchaigalai Varththagaridaththil Oppuvikkiraal.
25 aval Udai Balamum Alangaaramumaayirukkiradhu; Varungaalaththaippatriyum Magizhugiraal.
26 than Vaayai Gnaanam Vilangath Thirakkiraal; Dhayaiyulla Podhagam Aval Naavinmel Irukkiradhu.
27 aval Sombalin Appaththaip Pusiyaamal, Than Veettukkaariyam Eppadi Nadakkiradhu Endru Kannokkamaayirukkiraal.
28 aval Pillaigal Ezhumbi, Avalai Baakkiyavadhi Engiraargal; Aval Purushanum Avalaip Paarththu:
29 anegam Pengal Gunasaaligalaayirundhadhundu; Neeyo Avargal Ellaarukkum Merpattaval Endru Avalaip Pugazhugiraan.
30 sowndhariyam Vanjanaiyulladhu, Azhagum Veen; Karththarukku Bayappadugira Sthreeye Pugazhappaduvaal.
31 aval Kaigalin Balanai Avalukkuk Kodungal; Avaludaiya Seygaigal Vaasalgalil Avalaip Pugazhakkadavadhu.
